results.name: Eigentriangle by rows, n terms of (5 * A084057) followed by A084057(n).
comment: Right border = A084057: (1, 1, 6, 16, 56, 176,...). Row sums = (1, 6, 16, 56,...) = INVERT transform of (1, 5, 5, 5,...). Sum of n-th row terms = rightmost term of next row.
formula: Eigentriangle by rows, n terms of (5 * A084057) followed by A084057(n).
